doc.title: CIA

value.content: CIA (Confidentiality, Integrity, Availability) (also called the CIA triad or AIC triad) is a model that guides an organization's policies for information security.

doc.summary: CIA (Confidentiality, Integrity, Availability) (also called the CIA triad or AIC triad) is a model that guides an organization's policies for information security.
